character.flavorText:
Enzync City isn't all glitz and glamour for everyone who lives there. The less wealthy residents live in the southernmost part of the city, given the unflattering nickname of 'The Leftovers'. Tangy had grown up in the Leftovers, living through a plethora of rough conditions that shaped her to be tough and standoffish.

Her encounters with those from the well-off areas of Enzync City filled her with a deep sense of spite and anger. She resents people who have everything in life handed to them, and no person to her represents that sense of undeserved luck in life more than Sour, whom Tangy has made her eternal rival. With Sour's popularity became too big to ignore, Tangy wants nothing more than to tear him down.
character.subtitles: Whatever you wanna know...:dur:1.369[NL]I'm not telling you.:dur:1.435[NL]Don't make me repeat myself.:dur:2.221

character.flavorText:
A man born in the Preheats who quickly found more joy out at sea than anywhere on land. Salty started as just a humble sailor before slowly adopting the full classic pirate motif and ideals, traveling the world in search of new lands and hidden treasures.

Salty is one of the last true pirates in the entire world, though on his voyages, he's adopted many willing patrons into his crew, which he treats like family. Salty's bombastic personality and big heart makes him well appreciated by those who know him, though he's earned the heavy disdain of Enzync's Coast Guard, who hope to turn the man in for his unlawful treading of the Enzync shores.
character.subtitles: Ye think the world moved past the need for pirates?:dur:3.093[NL]Bahaha! What hogwash!:dur:3.102[NL]Leave these treacherous seas to an ol' salt, like me! Mwehehehe!:dur:6.224

character.flavorText:
Bitter is a polite man hailing from a quiet, unassuming town far east from The Preheats. He had become tired of the monotony he faced in his hometown, deciding to travel to sate his desire for something more in life. His most recent trip had him visit Enzync City across the ocean to witness many interesting new faces, the most interesting to him being Sweet, who he watched perform during her bout with the Togarashi Town residents alongside Sour.

Something seems to trouble the young man beyond his boredom, though very little knows him personally enough to understand what that may be.
character.subtitles: You...:dur:1.362[NL]I know you...:dur:2.04[NL]Heh... heheheheheheheh... *inhales*:dur:2.921[NL]Oh, this couldn't be more perfect.:dur:3.32

character.flavorText:
Good friends, good vibes, and good music is what this guy is all about. Ace, an anthropomorphic dragon, revels in the atmosphere of big cities, finding the vibes of Enzync City very similar to that of his home in Brooklyn, New York. He's very attuned to the cold, usually making his appearances during the winter, and bringing swaths of fine, crystalline snow wherever he moves.

Music means a lot to Ace, He'll always appreciate a good bout of song with fellow city dwellers, and when he's feeling overwhelmed, the relaxing melodies of music can help set his mind straight again.

It’s no secret who these two really are. Boyfriend and Girlfriend have managed to manifest into just about any world you could imagine, remixed and reimagined in thousands of different ways, all in the name of getting funky and battling new opponents. No boundaries or rules or any force in the universe can stop their music or their passionate and deeply provocative desire for each other.

Their escapades into the Flavor Rave universe is yet another one of their attempts to find new challengers. Taking the nicknames `Funky` and `Saucy` in order to blend in, they seek to challenge this world’s top stars before their story moves to new mediums.

This rebellious idol girl serves as the mascot for Team TBD. In lore, she’s a misfit schoolgirl by day who hides her identity under her tricked-out helmet to become an underground idol by night. She adores music, always seeking out unique and interesting performers to expand her repertoire of connections and tunes. Her sense of not fitting into her own world inspired her to start breaking through into different universes to find new people and sounds.

This naturally led her to come in contact with Boyfriend and Girlfriend, who come to her often for recommendations of new opponents or to gain access into new worlds.
character.subtitles: Alright you two.:dur:0.929[NL]Let's get you back home before someone notices.:dur:2.582
